title: The Night of the New Moon
description: A former marine, who once was the hero for a woman in an abusive marriage, is back on ‘Dateline.’ But this time, has his desire to help gone too far? Andrea Canning has chosen this episode as one of her most memorable classic episodes.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
